This is an add on ticket to camp/stay in the festival. You need to have festival ticket seperately. "Valid for full 3 days - no 1 day options available." Inclusions: Space to pitch your own tent, with access to washrooms, charging points & drinking water. You can access the camping/stay area and the exclusive curated afters.
Note: Tent and gear are not provided ‚Äì you must bring your own camping essentials.
offers.name: Pitch Your Own Tent
